cbinstall.name: RaidPlanner Plugin
cbinstall.author: Taracque
cbinstall.description: Synchronizes CB fields with RaidPlanner user fields.

param.name: cols
param.label: Width of field
param.description: Width of field in characters, or in percentage. Default is 100%

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_register
param.label: Forbidden words at registration
param.description: You can set a list of bad words (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field for registration. Use comma twice (,,) to add comma as bad character.

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_edit
param.label: Forbidden words in user profile edits
param.description: You can set a list of bad words (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field when user updates his profile in profile edits. Use comma twice (,,) to add comma as bad character.

param.name: rpPlugEnabled
param.label: RaidPlanner Plugin Enabled
param.description: Specify Yes to enable RaidPlanner plugin.

param.name: rpPlugDirectSync
param.label: RaidPlanner Direct Synchronization
param.description: Assign RaidPlanner characters directly to users, if user removes a Character from the list, it will be automatically deleted from the database.

param.name: rpPlugCharactersField
param.label: Characters field
param.description: Field name in CB for Characters (don't forget to include cb_ prefix!)

param.name: rpPlugVacationsField
param.label: Vacations field
param.description: Field name in CB for Vacation periods (don't forget to include cb_ prefix!)

param.name: rpPlugCalSecretField
param.label: Calendar secret field
param.description: Field name in CB for Calendar secret (don't forget to include cb_ prefix!)
